Larry Masha made the sympathetic inquiry

your wife is improving she is now

wife came to India some months later she

power of
nature this familiarity has bred a

our relation with nature is one that

tar or incarnation of wisdom Soleri
Masha may justly be called

apart from the miracles of his own life

ordinary grasp in reference to miracles
